page.title: 13Junior Red Cross. Woking.
page.content: Samantha is a junior member of the Red Cross. We have our Red Cross meetings on Wednesday evenings from 6.15 to 7.15. We do quite a few courses and do exams at the end of them. Last year I did my First Aid exam and this year I did my Home Nursing exam and got my certificates.Now I am doing my Message exam which is sending secret codes. We have lots of outings to Thorpe Park and The Sandpits. We have special visits too with our exams like the Fire Station and the Police Station. We have people to see us at the Centre like a Policeman who told us about his work and a Fireman who had come in the fire engine and told us about his work and all about the fire engine. The Red Cross helps the sick and suffering all over the world.
